description: Itou Nonoha is Kaito`s childhood friend, and a bright classmate of his at Root Academy. She is a bit tomboyish, and when it comes to Kaito her hand can often move before her mouth does. Nonoha is a great athlete and her memory is outstanding, but she is completely stumped when it comes to puzzles. Her hobby is making sweets.
name: Itou Nonoha
